package collection;
import java.util.*;
class Student
{
	int Sno;
	String Sname;
	void getdata(int n,String st)
	{
		Sno=n;
		Sname=st;
	}
	void display()
	{
		System.out.println("id="+Sno);
		System.out.println("name="+Sname);
	}
}
public class ArrayListExample1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//creates a non-generic Array List
				ArrayList al = new ArrayList();
				System.out.println("\n Initial size of an al : " 
				+ al.size());
				
				//Add Elements
				al.add("A");
				al.add("B");
				al.add(10);
				al.add("C");
				al.add("A");
				al.add("B");
				
				//add element at specific index
				al.add(1, "D");
				System.out.println("\n  size of an al : " 
						+ al.size());
				System.out.println("\n Content of al : " + al);
		//Generic Array List
		//ArrayList al = new ArrayList();
		 ArrayList<String> list=new ArrayList<String>();//Creating arraylist    
	      list.add("Mango");//Adding object in ArrayList    
	      list.add("Apple");    
	      list.add("Banana");    
	      list.add("Grapes");  
	      //list.add(1);
	      //Printing the ArrayList object   
	      System.out.println(list);
	      System.out.println("size of list="+list.size());
	    
	      
	      //Traversing list through Iterator  
	      Iterator itr=list.iterator();//getting the Iterator  
	      while(itr.hasNext()){//check if iterator has the elements  
	       System.out.println(itr.next());//printing the element and move to next  
	      }
	      
	      
	      //Traversing list through for-each loop  
	      for(String fruit:list)    
	        System.out.println(fruit); 
	      
	      
	      list.remove(0);
	     for(String fruit:list)    
		        System.out.println(fruit);  
	     
	     
	      if(list.contains("Mango"))
	    	  System.out.println("Search Successfull");
	      else 
	    	  System.out.println("Not found");
	      
	      
	      ArrayList<Integer> list1=new ArrayList<Integer>();//Creating arraylist    
	      list1.add(1);//Adding object in ArrayList    
	      list1.add(2);    
	      list1.add(3);    
	      list1.add(4); 
	      System.out.println(list1);
	     ArrayList<Integer> list5=new ArrayList<Integer>();
	      list5.add(1);//Adding object in ArrayList    
	      list5.add(2);    
	      list5.add(3);    
	      list5.add(4); 
	     list1.addAll(list5);
	   //  list1.removeAll(list5);
	      //Printing the ArrayList object   
	      System.out.println(list1);  
	     
	      Student s=new Student();
	      s.getdata(1, "ABC");
	      Student s1=new Student();
	      s1.getdata(2, "PQR");
	      
	      ArrayList<Student> list2=new ArrayList<Student>();//Creating arraylist    
	      list2.add(s);//Adding object in ArrayList    
	      list2.add(s1);  
	      Student sd=new Student();
	      System.out.println("content of list student");
	      System.out.println(list2);  
	    //  Iterator itr1=list2.iterator();//getting the Iterator
	     for(Student ss:list2)
	    	  ss.display();
	     
	      //Printing the ArrayList object   
	     System.out.println(list2.get(0).Sno); 
	      System.out.println(list2.get(0).Sname); 
	      
	}

}
